page.title: 14LUSTON HEALTH WORKERS
page.content: In Luston the{District Nurse}comes around every week.Lucky for us there has never been anything serious,but we still have the odd bugs that go around but they soon get better and it's back to normal. If you do need the{doctor}you have to go to Orleton,Kingsland or Leominster. In Leominster there is a cottage {hospital}, if there is any major illness you have to go to the County or General Hospital in Hereford. To be a district nurse you have to pass a qualification or exam.The district nurse is also for Eyton, Leominster and Yarpole as well as Luston.The school children have regular check ups on their sight, hearing,teeth,heads,hands and their development by doctors and health workers.The{physiotherapist}helps children who have been referred to her
